doc.field: The following import levies for white and raw sugar are effective tomorrow, in European currency units (ecu) per 100 kilos. White sugar, denatured and non-denatured 51.94 versus 51.36 previously. Raw sugar, denatured and non-denatured 44.05 versus 43.69 previously. The rate for raws is based on 92 pct yield. Reuter
